name: Bub-O Collect!
description:
Help Bub-O collect flowers for his special lady friend!

In this action puzzler for the Playdate, blow your bubble to bounce, collect flowers and escape all 15 levels. Push acorns and avoid the burs to find secrets and unlockables!

Controls:

  • D-pad: move Bub-O
  • A: form/shoot bubble
  • B: cancel (empty) bubble
  • Crank: turn bumpers

Can you help Bub-O win the heart of his beloved?

Please do not hesitate to mention any bugs or strange things while playing. I still haven't had a chance to play Bub-O Collect on real hardware yet, so minor adjustments might be coming.
